title: Gillingham pitches next step for emergency response service dedicated to mental-health calls
description: Winnipeg Mayor Scott Gillingham wants to hire a consultant to create a detailed proposal for how the city can launch an emergency service fully dedicated to mental health calls.
content:
Winnipeg Mayor Scott Gillingham wants to hire a consultant to create a detailed proposal for how the city can launch an emergency service fully dedicated to mental health calls.
